name: BriX - Nokia 3310
description:
At the start of the game you will be shown a table.


Then it will be mixed. Your task - restore order.

Menu controls:

  • Arrows and Enter

Game controls:

  • Move focus   - arrows
  • Move cells   - arrows with the Shift or, for compatibility with Nokia, Home-End-Delete-PageDown
  • Exit to menu - Esc
